messages.subject: Re: [UnschoolingDiscussion] candid camera
messages.msgSnippet: ... Well - I guess we re all inspiring each other. I picture Ren - she s SO lovely and colorful and graceful and happy - and I want to BE her!! Then I picture
messages.messageBody:
On Jun 7, 2004, at 4:35 PM, starsuncloud@... wrote:

> Aw...that's SO sweet!
> And all this time, I've been thinking, "I hope I can evolve into the
> kind of parents that Robyn/Kelly/Pam/Joyce/Anne/Sandra/Marji etc...
> are. You guys are on my altar, believe me.

Well - I guess we're all inspiring each other. I picture Ren - she's SO
lovely and colorful and graceful and happy - and I want to BE her!!
Then I picture Kelly - smart and honest and speaking so clearly, right
from the heart all the time - and I want to be HER!! And same for the
others Ren listed - plus add Rue and Karen and Kathryn and others I'm
not thinking of right now - I have a bunch of people I met at the Live
and Learn conference all in full living color with surround sound in my
head and I use you all as my inspiration on a regular basis!!!

-pam
National Home Education Network
<www.NHEN.org>
Serving the entire homeschooling community since 1999
through information, networking and public relations.

messages.subject: Re: [UnschoolingDiscussion] candid camera
messages.msgSnippet: ***Deb I just imagine, since I haven t actually met her in real life.*** You ll meet me in Peabody in August.  And then your skin will blister and your nails
messages.messageBody:
***Deb I just imagine, since I haven't actually met her in real life.***

You'll meet me in Peabody in August. And then your skin will blister and
your nails will fall out and you'll spend the rest of your life trying to
forget.

cackle, cackle, cackle....
Deb

messages.subject: candid camera
messages.msgSnippet: I hope I can evolve into the kind of parents that Robyn/Kelly/Pam/Joyce/Anne/Sandra/Marji etc... are. You guys are on my altar, believe me. Oh, and
messages.messageBody:
""I hope I can evolve into the kind of parents that Robyn/Kelly/Pam/Joyce/Anne/Sandra/Marji etc... are. You guys are on my altar, believe me."

Oh, and Rue...gentle, sweet Rue. :)
Deb I just imagine, since I haven't actually met her in real life.

And that's an altar of worship, not sacrifice. Truly.

Ren


Learn about unschooling at:
http://groups.yahoo.com/group/unschoolingbasics/

messages.subject: candid camera
messages.msgSnippet: I like to imagine Sandra or Ren or Kelly or Pam, or some of the other people I met at the conference last year - not only as a witness which really helps, but
messages.messageBody:
"I like to imagine Sandra or Ren or Kelly or Pam, or some of the other people
I met at the conference last year - not only as a witness which really
helps, but also thinking "what might they do/say at his moment?" -"

Aw...that's SO sweet!
And all this time, I've been thinking, "I hope I can evolve into the kind of parents that Robyn/Kelly/Pam/Joyce/Anne/Sandra/Marji etc... are. You guys are on my altar, believe me.

Ren

Learn about unschooling at:
http://groups.yahoo.com/group/unschoolingbasics/
